name: Kikak - Word Puzzle
description:
Kikak is a puzzle for word game lovers! a new and simple concept to exercise your skills.

Create words and place them on the board to link the 2 letters initially present on the board. Once the puzzle is completed you won! You can beat your own score games after games and look at your best achievements.

Kikak is a human scale game crafted with love by 3 friends. Do not hesitate to send us your comments and feedback. We'll be happy to discuss and integrate your idea in the future versions of Kikak.

This game is free, without ads, without push-notifications, without in-app purchases and without trackers.

Available in French and English language thanks to Ortograf Inc who helped building the dictionaries (ortograf.ws).
